chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
f: bool -> bool -> bool
Hf1: forall x a b : bool, a ⪦ b -> f x a ⪦ f x b
Hf2: f ⟘ ⟘ = ⟘
lbpw_mono_1: forall l m : lb, lb_pointwise l nil ⪯ lb_pointwise l m
lbpw_mono_f_0: forall (g : bool -> bool) (l m : lb), g ⟘ = ⟘ -> g ⟘ ⪦ g ⟙ -> l ⪯ m -> map g l ⪯ map g m
m: lb
l: lb

Goal:
m ⪯ nil -> lb_pointwise l m ⪯ lb_pointwise l nil

Premises:
map : forall A B : Type, (A -> B) -> list A -> list B
Notation lb := (list bool)
lb_pointwise = fix lb_pointwise (l m : lb) {struct l} : lb := match l with | nil => match m with | nil => nil | _ :: _ => map (f ⟘) m end | x :: l0 => match m with | nil => map (fun x0 : bool => f x0 ⟘) l | y :: m0 => f x y :: lb_pointwise l0 m0 end end : lb -> lb -> lb Arguments lb_pointwise (_ _)%list_scope
nil : list ?A where ?A : [f : bool -> bool -> bool Hf1 : forall x a b : bool, a ⪦ b -> f x a ⪦ f x b Hf2 : f ⟘ ⟘ = ⟘ lbpw_mono_1 : forall l m : lb, lb_pointwise l nil ⪯ lb_pointwise l m lbpw_mono_f_0 : forall (g : bool -> bool) (l m : lb), g ⟘ = ⟘ -> g ⟘ ⪦ g ⟙ -> l ⪯ m -> map g l ⪯ map g m l : lb m : lb |- Type]
Inductive bool : Set := true : bool | false : bool

Tauto.A : ?TA -> ?AA -> Tauto.GFormula where ?TA : [f : bool -> bool -> bool Hf1 : forall x a b : bool, a ⪦ b -> f x a ⪦ f x b Hf2 : f ⟘ ⟘ = ⟘ lbpw_mono_1 : forall l m : lb, lb_pointwise l nil ⪯ lb_pointwise l m lbpw_mono_f_0 : forall (g : bool -> bool) (l m : lb), g ⟘ = ⟘ -> g ⟘ ⪦ g ⟙ -> l ⪯ m -> map g l ⪯ map g m l : lb m : lb |- Type] ?TX : [f : bool -> bool -> bool Hf1 : forall x a b : bool, a ⪦ b ->...-> map g l ⪯ map g m l : lb m : lb |- Type]
Tauto.I : Tauto.GFormula -> option ?AF -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula where ?TA : [f : bool -> bool -> bool Hf1 : forall x a b : bool, a ⪦ b -> f x a ⪦ f x b Hf2 : f ⟘ ⟘ = ⟘ lbpw_mono_1 : forall l m : lb, lb_pointwise l nil ⪯ lb_pointwise l m lbpw_mono_f_0 : forall (g : bool -> bool) (l m : lb), g ⟘ = ⟘ -> g ⟘ ⪦ g ⟙ -> l ⪯ m -> map g l ⪯ map g m l : lb m : lb |- Type] ?TX : [f : bool -> bool -> bool Hf1 : forall x a b : bool, a ⪦ b ->...-> map g l ⪯ map g m l : lb m : lb |- Type]
map_ext_in_iff : map ?f ?l = map ?g ?l < -> (forall a : ?A, In a ?l -> ?f a = ?g a) where ?A : [f : bool -> bool -> bool Hf1 : forall x a b : bool, a ⪦ b -> f x a ⪦ f x b Hf2 : f ⟘ ⟘ = ⟘ lbpw_mono_1 : forall l m : lb, lb_pointwise l nil ⪯ lb_pointwise l m lbpw_mono_f_0 : forall (g : bool -> bool) (l m : lb), g ⟘ = ⟘ -> g ⟘ ⪦ g ⟙ -> l ⪯ m -> map g l ⪯ map g m l : lb m : lb |- Type] ?B : [f : bool -> bool ->...-> map g l ⪯ map g m l : lb m : lb |- list ?A]
fst : ?A * ?B -> ?A where ?A : [f : bool -> bool -> bool Hf1 : forall x a b : bool, a ⪦ b -> f x a ⪦ f x b Hf2 : f ⟘ ⟘ = ⟘ lbpw_mono_1 : forall l m : lb, lb_pointwise l nil ⪯ lb_pointwise l m lbpw_mono_f_0 : forall (g : bool -> bool) (l m : lb), g ⟘ = ⟘ -> g ⟘ ⪦ g ⟙ -> l ⪯ m -> map g l ⪯ map g m l : lb m : lb |- Type] ?B : [f : bool -> bool -> bool Hf1 : forall x a b : bool, a ⪦ b ->...-> map g l ⪯ map g m l : lb m : lb |- Type]

left : ?A -> {?A} + {?B} where ?A : [f : bool -> bool -> bool Hf1 : forall x a b : bool, a ⪦ b -> f x a ⪦ f x b Hf2 : f ⟘ ⟘ = ⟘ lbpw_mono_1 : forall l m : lb, lb_pointwise l nil ⪯ lb_pointwise l m lbpw_mono_f_0 : forall (g : bool -> bool) (l m : lb), g ⟘ = ⟘ -> g ⟘ ⪦ g ⟙ -> l ⪯ m -> map g l ⪯ map g m l : lb m : lb |- Prop] ?B : [f : bool -> bool -> bool Hf1 : forall x a b : bool, a ⪦ b ->...-> map g l ⪯ map g m l : lb m : lb |- Prop]

pair : ?A -> ?B -> ?A * ?B where ?A : [f : bool -> bool -> bool Hf1 : forall x a b : bool, a ⪦ b -> f x a ⪦ f x b Hf2 : f ⟘ ⟘ = ⟘ lbpw_mono_1 : forall l m : lb, lb_pointwise l nil ⪯ lb_pointwise l m lbpw_mono_f_0 : forall (g : bool -> bool) (l m : lb), g ⟘ = ⟘ -> g ⟘ ⪦ g ⟙ -> l ⪯ m -> map g l ⪯ map g m l : lb m : lb |- Type] ?B : [f : bool -> bool -> bool Hf1 : forall x a b : bool, a ⪦ b ->...-> map g l ⪯ map g m l : lb m : lb |- Type]
VarMap.Empty : VarMap.t ?A where ?A : [f : bool -> bool -> bool Hf1 : forall x a b : bool, a ⪦ b -> f x a ⪦ f x b Hf2 : f ⟘ ⟘ = ⟘ lbpw_mono_1 : forall l m : lb, lb_pointwise l nil ⪯ lb_pointwise l m lbpw_mono_f_0 : forall (g : bool -> bool) (l m : lb), g ⟘ = ⟘ -> g ⟘ ⪦ g ⟙ -> l ⪯ m -> map g l ⪯ map g m l : lb m : lb |- Type]
None : option ?A where ?A : [f : bool -> bool -> bool Hf1 : forall x a b : bool, a ⪦ b -> f x a ⪦ f x b Hf2 : f ⟘ ⟘ = ⟘ lbpw_mono_1 : forall l m : lb, lb_pointwise l nil ⪯ lb_pointwise l m lbpw_mono_f_0 : forall (g : bool -> bool) (l m : lb), g ⟘ = ⟘ -> g ⟘ ⪦ g ⟙ -> l ⪯ m -> map g l ⪯ map g m l : lb m : lb |- Type]

ZMicromega.normalise : RingMicromega.Formula BinNums.Z -> ?T -> Tauto.cnf (RingMicromega.NFormula BinNums.Z) ?T where ?T : [f : bool -> bool -> bool Hf1 : forall x a b : bool, a ⪦ b -> f x a ⪦ f x b Hf2 : f ⟘ ⟘ = ⟘ lbpw_mono_1 : forall l m : lb, lb_pointwise l nil ⪯ lb_pointwise l m lbpw_mono_f_0 : forall (g : bool -> bool) (l m : lb), g ⟘ = ⟘ -> g ⟘ ⪦ g ⟙ -> l ⪯ m -> map g l ⪯ map g m l : lb m : lb |- Type]
ZMicromega.negate : RingMicromega.Formula BinNums.Z -> ?T -> Tauto.cnf (RingMicromega.NFormula BinNums.Z) ?T where ?T : [f : bool -> bool -> bool Hf1 : forall x a b : bool, a ⪦ b -> f x a ⪦ f x b Hf2 : f ⟘ ⟘ = ⟘ lbpw_mono_1 : forall l m : lb, lb_pointwise l nil ⪯ lb_pointwise l m lbpw_mono_f_0 : forall (g : bool -> bool) (l m : lb), g ⟘ = ⟘ -> g ⟘ ⪦ g ⟙ -> l ⪯ m -> map g l ⪯ map g m l : lb m : lb |- Type]
VarMap.Branch : VarMap.t ?A -> ?A -> VarMap.t ?A -> VarMap.t ?A where ?A : [f : bool -> bool -> bool Hf1 : forall x a b : bool, a ⪦ b -> f x a ⪦ f x b Hf2 : f ⟘ ⟘ = ⟘ lbpw_mono_1 : forall l m : lb, lb_pointwise l nil ⪯ lb_pointwise l m lbpw_mono_f_0 : forall (g : bool -> bool) (l m : lb), g ⟘ = ⟘ -> g ⟘ ⪦ g ⟙ -> l ⪯ m -> map g l ⪯ map g m l : lb m : lb |- Type]
lb_mask_app : forall l m a b : lb, length l = length m -> l ⪯ m -> a ⪯ b -> l ++ a ⪯ m ++ b
Inductive lb_mask : lb -> lb -> Prop := in_lb_mask_0 : forall l : lb, nil ⪯ l | in_lb_mask_1 : forall l : lb, l ⪯ nil -> ⟘ :: l ⪯ nil | in_lb_mask_2 : forall (x y : bool) (l m : lb), x ⪦ y -> l ⪯ m -> x :: l ⪯ y :: m Arguments lb_mask (_ _)%list_scope Arguments in_lb_mask_0 _%list_scope Arguments in_lb_mask_1 [l]%list_scope Arguments in_lb_mask_2 (_ _)%bool_scope [l m]%list_scope
ext_in_map : forall (A B : Type) (f g : A -> B) (l : list A), map f l = map g l -> forall a : A, In a l -> f a = g a
map_ext_in : forall (A B : Type) (f g : A -> B) (l : list A), (forall a : A, In a l -> f a = g a) -> map f l = map g l
map_ext : forall (A B : Type) (f g : A -> B), (forall a : A, f a = g a) -> forall l : list A, map f l = map g l
lb_mask_ind : forall P : lb -> lb -> Prop, (forall l : lb, P nil l) -> (forall l : lb, l ⪯ nil -> P l nil -> P (⟘ :: l) nil) -> (forall (x y : bool) (l m : lb), x ⪦ y -> l ⪯ m -> P l m -> P (x :: l) (y :: m)) -> forall l l0 : lb, l ⪯ l0 -> P l l0
lb_mask_sind : forall P : lb -> lb -> SProp, (forall l : lb, P nil l) -> (forall l : lb, l ⪯ nil -> P l nil -> P (⟘ :: l) nil) -> (forall (x y : bool) (l m : lb), x ⪦ y -> l ⪯ m -> P l m -> P (x :: l) (y :: m)) -> forall l l0 : lb, l ⪯ l0 -> P l l0
lb_mask_leb : forall (x y : bool) (l m : lb), x ⪦ y -> l ⪯ m -> x :: l ⪯ y :: m
in_lb_mask_2 : forall (x y : bool) (l m : lb), x ⪦ y -> l ⪯ m -> x :: l ⪯ y :: m
lb_pointwise_sym : forall l m : lb, (forall x y : bool, f x y = f y x) -> lb_pointwise l m = lb_pointwise m l
